name: fpm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c0, co(c2, cpm, c1)))

stmt.origin: mp3an12(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c0, co(c2, cpm, c1)), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c0, co(c2, cpm, c1)))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wf(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c2, cpm, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c0, co(c2, cpm, c1)))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wf(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c2, cpm, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wf(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c2, cpm, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c0, co(c2, cpm, c1)))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)

comment: A total function is a partial function. (Contributed by NM, 15-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Dec-2013.)
